description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Description: Magnetic By Nature captures the essence of Portal's physics and momentum based gameplay inside of a 2D platformer!  Using magnetism, you have the ability to attract and repel from magnets while trying to escape a forgotten underground city full of dangerous obstacles.  Prepare to embark on an energetic adventure that will push both your intellect and your reflexes to their limits.
